thread.title: Tom Oktavec, Seymour, IN
thread.title_full: Brake Performance reviewed by Tom Oktavec, Seymour, IN

author: Tom Oktavec, Seymour, IN
title: Tom Oktavec, Seymour, IN
text: I highly recommend this company. Excellent product, fast free shipping. I even received a call from the company to make sure my shipping address which was different from my billing address, was valid. That's service!
